*   ‚ö° **Algorithm Development**: Prototype, test, and implement algorithms using high-level programming language.

## About MATLAB
MATLAB stands as a premier platform for numerical computing and technical programming, widely adopted in academia, research, and industry. This high-performance environment combines a desktop interface tuned for iterative analysis and design processes with a programming language that expresses matrix and array mathematics directly. The interactive environment enables users to explore data, develop algorithms, and create models and applications.

This desktop version provides the complete MATLAB experience optimized for both macOS and Windows operating systems. It includes fundamental mathematical functions for linear algebra, statistics, Fourier analysis, filtering, optimization, and numerical integration, along with specialized toolboxes that extend the environment to solve particular classes of problems in various engineering and scientific domains.

---

*   ‚úÖ Interactive apps for iterative exploration and design
*   ‚úÖ Extensive toolboxes for specialized applications
*   ‚úÖ Native support for matrix and array operations

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   5 GB of available storage space (10-15 GB for typical installation)

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   5 GB of available storage space (10-15 GB for typical installation)
